title: Akkurat + Serif
content: Can anyone suggest a good serif to pair with Akkurat?
author: typeformed

comments.content: What is your project? Who is your audience?
Akkurat is being used as a primary corporate typeface. Looking for a serif face to compliment Akkurat.
What type of corporation? This is probably a better determining factor than what works with Akkurat. Literally thousands of typefaces will work well with Akkurat.
